text: In order to do that there would need to be a way for Pkg to know which packages are not available to download so those could be filtered out when doing the "resolve step".

text: That's true. Now, the package server returns 404 and empty response for version that is not present. But I guess some way to obtain present of multiple versions at once would be needed to make it reasonably fast.

text: The full list of all packages available would be needed up front

text: So, is this reasonable request and should I fill it as issue?

text: I'm not sure it is that reasonable, I think the assumption has to be that the package server has the packages needed. Otherwise it is faulty.
